clinical_study.brief_title: Magnetic Resonance (MR) Spectroscopy of Breast Cancer Tissue
clinical_study.official_title: HR MAS MR Spectroscopy of Breast Cancer Tissue

lead_sponsor.agency: Norwegian University of Science and Technology

collaborator.agency: The Norwegian Women´s Public Health Association

clinical_study.source: Norwegian University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock:
Breast cancer tissue is collected from women undergoing scheduled surgery for breast cancer. The tissue specimen are analyzed by MR spectroscopy. After MR, the intact tissue specimen can be analyzed by other methods, such as histopathology.
The MR spectral profiles are compared to clinical findings such as the patients diagnosis, lymph node status and tumor size.

study_pop.textblock: women in surgery for breast cancer

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Palpable breast cancer lesion
